select MenuId,Id,Status,CodeClass,MenuCode,MenuName,PageUrl,ApplicationId,ParentId,Levels,EndFlag,Picture,OrderNo,Description,OpenInFrameFlag,SelectOnRefreshFlag,CanFullScreenFlag from Sys_Menu a inner join ( select distinct ResourceId from pub_groupPermit x inner join Pub_GroupMember y on x.GroupId = y.GroupId where UserId=#UserId# and len(ResourceId) = 5 )b on a.MenuId = b.ResourceId
MenuId=#MenuId# Id=#Id# Status=#Status# CodeClass=#CodeClass# MenuCode=#MenuCode# MenuName=#MenuName# PageUrl=#PageUrl# ApplicationId=#ApplicationId# ParentId=#ParentId# Levels=#Levels# EndFlag=#EndFlag# Picture=#Picture# OrderNo=#OrderNo# Description=#Description# OpenInFrameFlag=#OpenInFrameFlag# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

with CTE_Sys_Menu as ( select a.MenuId,a.Id,a.Status,a.CodeClass,a.MenuCode,a.MenuName,a.PageUrl,a.ApplicationId,a.ParentId,a.Levels,a.EndFlag,a.Picture,a.OrderNo,a.Description,a.OpenInFrameFlag,a.SelectOnRefreshFlag,a.CanFullScreenFlag from Sys_Menu a where a.Status=1 and ((#InCludeSelfFlag#=1 and a.MenuId=#MenuId# ) or (#InCludeSelfFlag#=0 and a.ParentId=#MenuId#)) union all select a.MenuId,a.Id,a.Status,a.CodeClass,a.MenuCode,a.MenuName,a.PageUrl,a.ApplicationId,a.ParentId,a.Levels,a.EndFlag,a.Picture,a.OrderNo,a.Description,a.OpenInFrameFlag,a.SelectOnRefreshFlag,a.CanFullScreenFlag from Sys_Menu a inner join CTE_Sys_Menu b on a.MenuId = b.ParentId where a.Status=1 )select m.* from CTE_Sys_Menu m
left join ( select distinct ResourceId from pub_groupPermit x inner join Pub_GroupMember y on x.GroupId = y.GroupId where UserId=#UserId# and len(ResourceId) = 5 )n on m.MenuId = n.ResourceId where n.ResourceId is not null
order by Levels asc,OrderNo asc

left join ( select distinct ResourceId from pub_groupPermit x inner join Pub_GroupMember y on x.GroupId = y.GroupId where UserId=#UserId# and len(ResourceId) = 5 )n on m.MenuId = n.ResourceId where n.ResourceId is not null
order by Levels asc,OrderNo asc
